website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Cell Regulate Nature Tech made a lot of purchasers happy and contented with its performance and style. Aside from its design, they were satisfied with the footwear's price and fit. Although several of them have problems and issues with its support and durability, the majority of them still recommend the shoe for different road running activities. According to them, the Puma Cell Regulate Nature Tech is an excellent option for those who are seeking good quality, visually-appealing and comfortable yet affordable running footwear.
pros: A lot of users said that the shoe was true to size
According to those reviewers who have tried it, the Puma Cell Regulate Nature Tech has good quality
It was stylish, based on some reviews
A handful of testers commented that the footwear was comfortable
As noted by several buyers, the shoe’s fitting was excellent
One of the positive comments was its affordable price
It was a great-looking shoe, according to many testers
cons: The shoe does not provide enough support, commented by one of the Puma Cell Regulate Nature Tech's users
As noted by a purchaser, the footwear was not durable
It easily tore apart after several uses only

customer_reviews.title: I typically wear a solid men's 8 but these were ...
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a solid men's 8 but these were a bit narrow and small. Would advise going up half size. The shoes themselves are gorgeous, I will be purchasing a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: tara coleman

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are a little tight.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! BEST Puma's I ever bought, fit great, i use them for work, very comfortable. I like my shoes to be nice and tight and these deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah moyher

customer_reviews.title: SO DAMN TIGHT.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great. The material doesn't feel cheap. Surprisingly comfortable. I say that because I'm flat footed and usually puma's have a merciless arch but with the memory foam padding they are super comfortable and don't bother my lack of arched feet at all. Now the down side and ultimately what kills the shoes for me. THEY ARE SO TIGHT. I mean jeez lousy tight. I highly recommend that if you purchase these you get them a half size larger than your normal size. I couldn't walk or stand for more that 4 hours before I had to throw them off
customer_reviews.author: The Good The Bad The Review

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great looking.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Puma style of my entire collection (over 3 dozen pairs). The toe fabric is durable yet elegant with a layered looking pattern to it (think carbon fiber). The wrap around laces seems weird at first but it allows for a much more fitted feel, especially if you wear a wide size. The black color is luxurious and rich looking but the white with grey accents are even nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Runs a half size too small but otherwise gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful shoe. I had to exchange it to a bigger size that I normally wear for Puma's. Puma makes some of the nicest shoes in my opinion. They also have black and grey and they look amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge U. Marroquin

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: ❤️ loveee. Bought thhis for my boyfriend and it looks so cute on him I am here adding to my review... We found out that the shoes are different sizes. I ordered 10.5 but I got a 9.5 and a 10.5. We never knew the soze difference until he complained that his toes are hurting. This is his second time wearing the shoes and It is sad. I really did like them, just disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nelecia

customer_reviews.title: Best Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I keep reordering these every 2 years. They are stylish, comfortable, and hold up extremely well. This is my third pair. My Mastiff chews on them so I get occasional holes, but they hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sebatech

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.text: These are really good looking shoes, and comfortable too. I wear 11.5 to 12 so I ordered size 13 and it was spot on. Puma runs small, they always have and likely always will, so keep that in mind when you order and you'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kouri Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good looking just not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The look of these shoes are top notch the quality though leaves something to be desired. I've owned many Pumas over my lifetime and I've never had any wear out as quick as these. I bought them in July and wear them maybe 3 days a week non consecutive. I have holes in the padding behind the heels.
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: All leather great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. He loved that the entire shoe was leather and that the whole shoe was black. This shoe is high quality and worth the value for the money. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TikTok Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: Puma, in my opinion, has some of the best looking shoes on the market today. Moreover, they are well made and for me they fit as expected. I would not, however, call these running shoes. While the cushion on the heel seems adequate, it definitely is not for the balls of the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Huge Puma fan! They never disappoint! Purchased these for my husband and he is extremely satisfied! My first purchase of these got lost in the mail so I got a refund and reordered them! Glad I did. I think Im going to purchase these for myself as well. Comfortable and True to size
customer_reviews.author: Sheneeses_Pieces

customer_reviews.title: Order a full size larger, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: Rating of 3 stars given. As far as the shoe, 5 stars; it is everything as advertised. Personally; the shoe was too small. I wear a legitimate size 14. My rationale was that a 13D might be okay. Some confusion relative to posted 13 D (M) size for the shoe. Net, net...relative to how the shoe is designed, it is likely one would require a full size larger than typical size. Return process is seamless; so I took a shot at ordering online.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong in buying these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: For the most part all I ever purchase providing I have the money is Puma. The most light weight shoe ever with all the bells and whistles. In my opinion the best shoe ever made
customer_reviews.author: Sir Robert

customer_reviews.title: Most of the item i buy is tie
customer_reviews.text: The Item was tie and i make my own label to ship back this is the tracking number: IT IS A GOOD QUALITY 420401659405803699300748619878 USPS PRIORITY

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Own a bunch of different styles of Puma's. They are all perfect. (I always order 1/2 size up for best fit).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe!... get lots of compliments!, however, I do agree with a lot of the other reviews, these shoes run a little small and narrow... buy a half size up and you’ll be fine... I love the shoe so much I’m actually buying another pair in a different color a half size bigger, so I’ll review soon...
customer_reviews.author: Drew R.

customer_reviews.title: Just love the brand
customer_reviews.text: From my point of view, PUMA is perfect in everything, material, design, cuts, styles, price and size. The size is perfectly fits me, like it was made for me.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Fit was too small at the front of the shoe and too tight through the width of the shoe for this Puma style. Disappointed because I've had a lot of success with Pumas be in the past.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, Great Price!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfort, ordering from Amazon did not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfort, ordering from Amazon did not disappoint. Will update later on how it holds up, I personally like the Puma brand for this type of shoe for its durability in high humidity conditions in the Pacific Islands.

customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoes. I have received compliments on the first day wore them which is today. Unfortunately, one shoe is defective as the air cushioned edge is no fully glued. It has a gap at the back end. I wonder if Amazon has a qc department...

They are really cool looking and get lots of compliments, but they are not something you want to wear for a long time. I should have returned them, but didn't feel like going through the hassle of a return for this. Would not buy these again!

customer_reviews.title: just an awesome looking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just an awesome looking sneaker. I own and have owned a half dozen Puma’s, and these are simply bad a_ _ looking. I fit squarely in a size 10. I ordered a 10 and they fit fine. I would recommend going up a half size if you occasionally go to a size 10.5. If you occasionally fit in a 9.5, they’ll fit perfect. These are just an awesome looking and comfortable sneaker. Well made too.

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Cell Regulate Nature Tech Sneaker
product_meta.description: The cell regulate nature tech represents the next generation of PUMA viz-tech. this pinnacle null combines a nature inspired material with our trademark cell cushioning technology. The PUMA logo on the vamp is bold, the lacing is exaggerated. The result, is a true game-changer.
